state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an fast paced round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to make an effort to venture west. After that, try to head west. With that accomplished, make an effort to go north. And then, head east. And then, make an effort to venture east. And then, try to move north. With that accomplished, retrieve the keycard from the floor of the cookery. After that, make absolutely sure that the hatch is unlocked with the keycard. And then, assure that the hatch in the cookery is opened. After that, attempt to go east. With that done, move south. Following that, try to go south. After that, travel east. If you can get around to doing that, recover the latchkey from the floor of the bathroom. That's it! -= Cookhouse =- Well, here we are in a cookhouse. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Cookhouse =-0/1

-= Salon =- You arrive in a salon. An usual kind of place. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Salon =-0/2

-= Launderette =- You have fallen into a launderette. Not the launderette you'd expect. No, this is a launderette. An open drawer is in the room. What a letdown! The drawer is empty! There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Launderette =-0/3

-= Scullery =- I am required to announce that you are now in the scullery. You can make out a closed fridge, which looks normal, right there by you. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Scullery =-0/4

-= Study =- I am sorry to announce that you are now in the study. You begin to take stock of what's here. You can see a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is ordinary. The mantelpiece appears to be empty. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Study =-0/5

-= Pantry =- You've just sauntered into a pantry. You can make out an opened display. What a letdown! The display is empty! You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Pantry =-0/6

-= Cookery =- You're now in a cookery. Were you looking for a chest? Because look over there, it's a chest. What a letdown! The chest is empty! You can see a closed fancy looking freezer in the corner. There is a closed hatch leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. There is a keycard on the floor. > -= Cookery =-0/7
You pick up the keycard from the ground. > -= Cookery =-0/8

-= Kitchen =- You arrive in a kitchen. A standard kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. You can make out a freezer. What a letdown! The freezer is empty! You make out a locked case nearby. There is an open hatch leading west. There is an open passageway leading south. > -= Kitchen =-0/11
-= Serious Office =- Well, here we are in the serious office. There is an open passageway leading north. There is an open door leading south. > -= Serious Office =-0/12
-= Spare Room =- You are in a spare room. A normal one. There is an open door leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. > -= Spare Room =-0/13
-= Bathroom =- You've just shown up in a bathroom. You see a trunk. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. There is a latchkey on the floor. > -= Bathroom =-0/14
